player.name: Kevin Garnett
player.physicalDescription: 6'11" power forward/center, fiercely intense competitor. Known for his intensity, trash-talking, and versatility. Defensive stalwart with a unique blend of skill and passion.

figure.name: Cain
figure.attributeDescription: A simple hoe or sickle, representative of his work as a farmer, often stained with earth.
figure.visualStyle: Realist painting style with earthy tones and strong chiaroscuro.
figure.clothing: Roughspun tunic of undyed wool or animal hide, secured with a simple leather belt. Barefoot or with roughly made sandals.
figure.physicalDescription: A muscular, rugged man with weathered skin and a determined, somewhat resentful gaze. Clothed in rough-hewn garments of animal hide. His hands are calloused and strong from working the land.

connection.thematic: Both exhibited intense, even violent, competitiveness fueled by a deep-seated resentment of others' success and recognition.
connection.narrative: Envy Made Flesh. His passion burned so hot that it consumed everything around him, leaving only ashes.

interactions.description: Kevin Garnett and Cain standing back-to-back, facing outward with confidence
Kevin Garnett and Cain standing together as equals
